review: I own: Boxee, AppleTV, Roku, Chromecast, and I have a powerful XBMC media center, and an XBMC Raspberry pi; along with a samsung and a philips smart TV, which doesnt count, but just for a complete list :)The Fire TV Stick is very good; 3 stars is a lot for me to give a product in this genre, as its really difficult to please me.My main issue with the Fire Stick is the customizability.  I dont want much, but I do want the ability to have a main dashboard, and the ability to hide everything.  I dont want to cycle through the 70 things I dont subscribe to to get to the 3 I do.I see a good future for this product, at least the capability of a good future, anyway.Apple TV > XBMC > FireTV > Chromecast > Everything Else
author: Roquen "Respiratory Therapist"

review: This is an awesome, affordable and easy to use product that is as simple as it sounds. The only thing I would like to see is a cross-app search function. Searching for a TV show/movie shows whether or not it is available on the Amazon platform. Having a Netflix, Amazon and Hulu account, it would be great if one search would show whether or not content was available across multiple accounts instead of "other ways to watch, HD, SD..."
